long_description:
Description
===========

A Chef cookbook for installing and configuring boto.

# Cookbook Dependencies

* python
* build-essential

Usage
=====

Example node.json to install & configure boto, plus fetch a file from S3:

	{
	  "boto": {
	    "install_method":"pip",
	    "aws_access_key_id":"foo",
	    "aws_secret_access_key":"bar",
	    "s3_fetch_bucket":"foo_bucket",
	    "s3_fetch_file":"foo_file.txt",
	    "s3_fetch_file_destination":"/tmp/foo_file.txt",
	  },
	  "run_list": [ "recipe[boto::default]", "recipe[boto::s3_fetch_file]" ]
	}

Same, but fetch and extract a zip file from S3 instead:

	{
	  "boto": {
	    "install_method":"pip",
	    "aws_access_key_id":"foo",
	    "aws_secret_access_key":"bar",
	    "s3_fetch_bucket":"foo_bucket",
	    "s3_fetch_file":"foo_file.zip",
	    "s3_fetch_file_destination":"/tmp/foo_file.zip",
	    "s3_file_extract_destination":"/root"
	  },
	  "run_list": [ "recipe[boto::default]", "recipe[boto::s3_fetch_and_extract_file]" ]
	}

recipes.boto::s3_fetch_file: Fetches and stores a file locally from S3.
recipes.boto::s3_store_file: Stores a local file to an S3 bucket.
recipes.boto::ebs_create_snapshot: Creates an EBS snapshot from a given EBS volume ID.
recipes.boto::s3_fetch_and_extract_file: Fetches and extracts a file from S3.

boto/s3_fetch_file.description: The S3 key/file to fetch with s3_fetch_file.

boto/install_method.description: The method used to install the boto library.

boto/ec2/region/endpoint.description: The EC2 region endpoint used for operations.

boto/s3_fetch_file_destination.description: The destination file/folder to store the fetched file with s3_fetch_file

boto/s3_fetch_bucket.description: The bucket to use when fetching a file with s3_fetch_file.

boto/s3_file_extract_destination.description: The destination folder to extract the fetched file with s3_fetch_file

boto/ec2/region/name.description: The EC2 region used for operations.

boto/s3_store_file.description: The local file to store with in S3 with s3_store_file.

boto/s3_store_bucket.description: The bucket to use when storing a file with s3_store_file.

boto/aws_access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key ID for boto.

boto/aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS Secrete Access Key for boto.

boto/ebs/volume/id.description: The EBS volume ID to use for operations such as backup and restore.

boto/num_retries.description: The number of times boto retries an action.
